[‚Üê Back to commands index](./)

Manage, equip, unequip your gear presets.

## /gearpresets view

**Usage**

- `/gearpresets view preset:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `preset` | `string` | Yes | The gear preset you want to select. | - |

## /gearpresets equip

**Usage**

- `/gearpresets equip gear_setup:<string> preset:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `gear_setup` | `string` | Yes | The gear setup you want to select. | - |
| `preset` | `string` | Yes | The gear preset you want to select. | - |

## /gearpresets create

**Usage**

- `/gearpresets create name:<string> [copy_setup:<string>] [pinned_setup:<string>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `name` | `string` | Yes | The name to give this preset. | - |
| `copy_setup` | `string` | No | Pick a setup to copy/use for this preset. | - |
| `pinned_setup` | `string` | No | Pick a setup to pin this setup too. | - |

## /gearpresets edit

**Usage**

- `/gearpresets edit gear_preset:<string> [pinned_setup:<string>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `gear_preset` | `string` | Yes | The gear preset you want to select. | - |
| `pinned_setup` | `string` | No | Pick a setup to pin this setup too. | reset |

## /gearpresets delete

**Usage**

- `/gearpresets delete [preset:<string>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `preset` | `string` | No | The gear preset you want to delete. | - |
